Sentencas: The combination of specified operating and performance parameters for an SOFC system, such as fuel flow rates, operating voltage and power density, affects capital and operating costs.
Titulo: A techno-economic model for SOFC power systems

Sentencas: Additional components of the cost of electricity are attributable to finance costs and system maintenance costs.
Titulo: A techno-economic model for SOFC power systems

Sentencas: While computing the cost of electricity from a given set of conditions is fairly straightforward, minimization of the cost of electricity generated from a solid oxide fuel cell power system requires development of functional relationships between the various design and operating parameters.
Titulo: A techno-economic model for SOFC power systems

Sentencas: Such a set of relationships is developed for a simple cycle natural gas-fueled SOFC power system.
Titulo: A techno-economic model for SOFC power systems

Sentencas: This work builds on the analysis methodology developed previously by the authors for SOFC operation on natural gas to include capital and operating cost maps.
Titulo: A techno-economic model for SOFC power systems

Sentencas: Relationships between fuel flow rates, stack resistance and operating voltage were defined in a closed form parametric model to predict power density, fuel utilization and efficiency at a specified operating point.
Titulo: A techno-economic model for SOFC power systems

Sentencas: The stack performance model was coupled via mass and energy balances with design equations to size system components such as heat exchangers and insulation.
Titulo: A techno-economic model for SOFC power systems

Sentencas: Estimated component costs, based on the required size of each component, are used to obtain an estimate of total system capital cost.
Titulo: A techno-economic model for SOFC power systems

Sentencas: The cost of electricity for some typical operating conditions is then calculated.
Titulo: A techno-economic model for SOFC power systems

Sentencas: The cost framework provides a useful tool for determining opportunities for cost minimization.
Titulo: A techno-economic model for SOFC power systems

Sentencas: The overall strategy employed in developing such a model is described and illustrated with various examples.
Titulo: A techno-economic model for SOFC power systems

Sentencas: This cost framework can be extended to SOFC power systems involving gas turbine combined cycles as well.
Titulo: A techno-economic model for SOFC power systems
